attributes.action: Once COVID-19 is no longer considered a risk, to have a one day national holiday
attributes.additional_details: To give the nation hope and a positive focus, a light at the end of the tunnel and something to look forward to at a time when morale is low, and no end appears to be in sight.
attributes.background: Once COVID-19 is no longer considered a risk to have a one day public holiday. Encourage local celebration and community spirit and allow the nation to take a moment to take a deep breath, and reflect, and mark a starting point of the nations healing.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
